Remediations.Description: Go Gold today to take advantage of exclusive Xbox discounts, special deals, and offers.

LocalizedProperties.ProductDescription:
What is the fate of those who have acquired divine power? Discover it in a fantasy RPG featuring stunning 3D battles!

Caine enters a ruins site in search of a feral relic said to be left behind by the gods and meets a mysterious girl in a mask. This strange encounter becomes the catalyst of a grand scheme that will change the worlds of humans and therians.
Will this new-found power lead to prosperity or destruction?

Have a 3D battle experience full of ambience featuring transformations that enable various skills and Bursts that can deal massive damage. Weapons can be customized to increase their power or be imbued with various effects.
Explore dynamic, constantly changing dungeons, take on many subquests and open up your path in a grand adventure!
LocalizedProperties.ShortDescription: What is the fate of those who have acquired divine power? Discover it in a fantasy RPG featuring stunning 3D battles!

Features: A fantasy RPG featuring stunning turn-based 3D battles!
Various skills and Bursts that can deal massive damage
Explore dynamic, constantly changing dungeons, take on many subquests
LocalizedProperties.MinimumNotes: Mouse, keyboard and touch screen are not supported.
